metadata.title: CVE-2012-2365 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Moodle 2.0.x before 2.0.9,2.1.x before 2.1.6, and 2.2.x before 2.2.3 allows remote authenticatedusers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the idnumber field tocohort/edit.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2365` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.4-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.4-1ubuntu1').
